entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Greater Sudbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:16 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 4:22 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
